## Source: ossf-package-analysis (06cba5a5cbce24252b9322e672688d9d557bf24fadb61e690bcb6798d04d75ea)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'x2vmlgml' @ 99.7 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
